definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Polygonum multiflorum Thunb. extract on the skin stable state of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究何首烏提取物對哺乳動物皮膚穩態的影響。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine Polygonum multiflorum has the function of hair blacking .
sentences.chinese: 傳統中藥何首烏具有烏鬚髮的作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the technologies of processing in Heshouwu braised.
sentences.chinese: 目的優化黑豆汁燉何首烏炮製工藝。

sentences.english: Objective:To Polygonum multiflorum system similar to the counterfeit goods for real and fake identification comparison of sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 目的對制何首烏的僞制相似品甘薯進真假鑑別比較。

sentences.english: Development Studies on Stilbene Glucoside from Polygonum multiflorum Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 何首烏中二苯乙烯苷的開發與應用。

sentences.english: The invention provides the instant tuber fleeceflower ultrafine powder and the preparation method.

definition: King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
